LetFreeTheCurseOfTaekwondo.name: Let Free the Curse of Taekwondo
LetFreeTheCurseOfTaekwondo.plot: A high school student disillusioned with his fatherâ€™s rural taekwondo gym meets a cheerful taekwondo student from Seoul. Their connection grows amid family struggles, separation, and eventual reunion a decade later, with taekwondo woven into the backdrop of their emotional journey.

TheGodOfHighSchool.name: The God of High School
TheGodOfHighSchool.plot: High school fighters from around the world enter a tournament where they can use any martial art to win and have a wish granted. The main character, Jin Mori, uses a fictionalized taekwondo-based style called Renewal Taekwondo, emphasizing fast, powerful kicks.

TheWhirlwindGirl.name: The Whirlwind Girl
TheWhirlwindGirl.plot: Qi Bai Cao, a passionate taekwondo student, trains under a former world champion while competing in tournaments, facing rivalries, friendships, and personal challenges along the way.
